item.title: 一位丹麦首席执行官从勒索软件破产中汲取的教训
item.description: 当小企业无力支付勒索软件费用时会发生什么？但首先...【原文：What happens when a small business can’t afford a ransomware payment? But first…】

item.title: 奇货通讯：现在购买，日后改变商业周期
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读《奇货》周刊，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and the economy.】

item.title: 中国威胁加剧，通用、福特股价大幅反弹受阻
item.description: 本以为今年会是百年汽车制造商通用汽车公司和福特汽车公司股价东山再起的一年，但久违的追涨势头已经停滞不前。【原文：It was expected to be the comeback year for the shares of century-old carmakers, General Motors Co. and Ford Motor Co., but a long overdue catch-up rally is already stalling.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长埃斯克里瓦称经济前景正在恶化
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）在其领导的西班牙中央银行发布的一份报告中称，该地区的经济前景正在恶化。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Jose Luis Escriva said the region’s economic outlook is getting worse, according to a presentation published by Spain’s central bank, which he heads.】

item.title: 法律诉讼受挫后，再生元制药公司遭遇两年来最糟糕的一个月
item.description: 再生元制药公司（Regeneron Pharmaceuticals Inc. 的股价将创下自 2022 年年中以来的最大单月跌幅，此前该公司遭遇了法律挫折，这为其眼科治疗大片 Eylea 的竞争疗法提前上市打开了大门。【原文：Regeneron Pharmaceuticals Inc. shares are headed for their biggest monthly drop since mid-2022 after a legal setback that opens the door to an early launch of a competing therapy to the drugmaker’s blockbuster eye treatment, Eylea.】

item.title: 英国改革使银行使用流行工具卸载风险的成本更低
item.description: 英国金融监管机构将加强银行对重大风险转移的利用，使 "无资金 "交易更容易进行，即银行利用保险来弥补潜在的贷款损失。【原文：UK financial regulators are set to bolster banks’ use of significant risk transfers by making it easier to do “unfunded” deals, where banks use insurance to cover potential loan losses.】

item.title: 智利 SQM 公司寻求锂业合作伙伴，为国际扩张提供资金支持
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，SQM 公司正在为其国际业务寻找合作伙伴，因为这家全球第二大锂供应商希望加强其在智利本土以外的业务。【原文：SQM is seeking a partner for its international operations as the world’s second-biggest lithium supplier looks to step up its presence outside of home-base Chile, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国机构对俄罗斯逃避制裁行为处以首张罚单
item.description: 英国负责监督制裁的监察机构首次对与俄罗斯有关的违规行为进行了经济处罚，对一家小型物业管理公司处以 15000 英镑（约合 20132 美元）的罚款，原因是该公司继续代表一名受制裁的个人进行交易。【原文：The British watchdog tasked with oversight of sanctions issued its first ever financial penalty for Russia-related violations, fining a small property management firm £15,000 ($20,132) for continuing to carry out transactions on behalf of a sanctioned individual.】

item.title: 津巴布韦顶级食品公司称 ZiG 要想获胜需要更多帮助
item.description: 津巴布韦最大的食品生产商表示，如果该国希望自 2009 年以来第六次尝试使用本地货币，那么该国新的金银支持货币将需要更多支持。【原文：Zimbabwe’s biggest food producer said the nation’s new bullion-backed currency will need more support if the country wants to make a success of its sixth attempt at a local unit since 2009.】

item.title: 新一轮石油风险引发哥伦比亚货币暴跌
item.description: 在古斯塔沃-彼得罗执政的大部分时间里，哥伦比亚的利率一直居高不下，以至于外国投资者可以容忍时有发生的政治动荡，而这些动荡通常会吓退外国投资者。【原文：For much of Gustavo Petro’s time in office, Colombia’s interest rates have been so high that foreign investors tolerated the sporadic bouts of political tumult that would have normally scared them off.】

item.title: 量子计算军备竞赛正在加速
item.description:
在本集《与汉娜-弗莱共话未来》中，弗莱来到 IBM 的研究机构，了解这项技术深不可测的力量所带来的希望和危险。【原文：

On this episode of The Future with Hannah Fry, Fry travels to IBM’s research facility to learn the promise and peril of the technology’s unfathomable power.

】

item.title: 温和通胀支持美联储再次大幅减息，债券上涨
item.description: 由于美联储青睐的美国基本通胀指标略有上升，交易员对 11 月份再次大幅降息的预期增强，因此国债上涨。【原文：Treasuries gained as a modest rise in the Federal Reserve’s favored measure of underlying US inflation reinforced trader expectations for another large interest-rate cut in November.】

item.title: 为讨好布鲁塞尔，梅洛尼将意大利赤字率目标定为到 2026 年达到 2.8
item.description: 根据一项新的财政计划，意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）领导的政府计划在两年内将意大利的财政赤字率降至 2.8%，该计划还将在大选前增加潜在支出。【原文：Premier Giorgia Meloni’s government plans to get Italy’s deficit down to 2.8% within two years, according to a new fiscal plan which also pencils in a potential pre-election spending boost.】

item.title: 首席执行官称法拉利电动超级跑车项目 "完全步入正轨
item.description: 法拉利首席执行官贝内代托-维格纳（Benedetto Vigna）周五在都灵举行的意大利科技周上表示，法拉利的电动超级跑车将于2025年第四季度亮相，目前已 "完全步入正轨"。【原文：Ferrari is “fully on track” with its electric supercar set to be unveiled in the fourth quarter of 2025, Chief Executive Officer Benedetto Vigna said Friday at the Italian Tech Week in Turin.】

item.title: 清理预算可能带来收益，塞内加尔债券减少损失
item.description: 分析师和投资者表示，塞内加尔计划对上届政府的财政账目进行调查，这令投资者感到恐慌，但该国的长期经济前景依然乐观，可能会为其债券提供支撑。【原文：Senegal spooked investors with a planned probe of the previous government’s fiscal accounts but the country’s longer-term economic prospects remain positive and may provide support for its bonds, analysts and investors said.】

item.title: 刚果 Glencore 铜矿陷入 8 亿欧元特许权使用费纠纷
item.description: 格伦科尔公司（Glencore Plc）在刚果民主共和国拥有的一座铜矿因特许权使用费问题与当地税务部门发生争执。【原文：A Glencore Plc-owned copper mine in the Democratic Republic of Congo is embroiled in a row over royalties with local tax authorities.】

item.title: 华尔街 ETF 资产达到 10 万亿美元里程碑
item.description: 美国交易所交易基金持有的资产首次达到 10 万亿美元，这种投资者友好型产品继续在华尔街大行其道。【原文：Assets held by exchange-traded funds in the US hit $10 trillion for the first time as the investor-friendly products continue their relentless takeover of Wall Street.】

item.title: 下一位首席执行官沃尔夫森出售英国零售商 2,900 万英镑股份
item.description: Next Plc 首席执行官西蒙-沃尔夫森（Simon Wolfson）出售了他在这家英国时装和家居用品零售商手中价值 2,900 万英镑（3,900 万美元）的股票后，该公司股价下跌。【原文：Next Plc’s share price dipped after CEO Simon Wolfson sold £29 million ($39 million) worth of his stock in the British fashion and homewares retailer.】

item.title: Meta 因密码泄露被爱尔兰监管机构罚款 9100 万欧元
item.description: 爱尔兰数据保护委员会在对 Meta Platforms 公司爱尔兰分公司存储密码的行为进行调查后，对该公司处以 9100 万欧元（约合 1.02 亿美元）的罚款。【原文：Ireland’s data protection commission has fined Meta Platforms Inc.’s Irish branch €91 million ($102 million) following an investigation into password storing by the company, according to a statement by the regulator.】

item.title: 英国目标在 2027 年转向 T+1 交易，与欧盟计划无关
item.description: 带头推动英国向更快的贸易体制转变的组织正在准备应对英国在脱欧之前进行转变的可能性，此举可能会给整个地区的金融专业人士带来一系列头疼问题。【原文：The group spearheading the UK’s shift to a faster trading regime is preparing for the possibility that the country makes the switch in advance of the European Union, a move that could create a litany of headaches for financial professionals across the region.】

item.title: 巴西石油之都获得自相矛盾的信任票
item.description:
里约热内卢会议上的热情证明了化石燃料行业的实力，即使该国正在为明年的联合国气候峰会做准备。【原文：

The enthusiasm at a Rio de Janeiro conference attests to the fossil-fuel industry’s strength, even as the nation preps to host next year’s UN climate summit.

】

item.title: 水晶球 "破裂，新研究显示交易者未能致富
item.description: 如果投资者事先知道美联储最近一次降息的幅度，他们是否会在根据这一影响市场的情报进行的股票和债券交易中赚大钱？【原文：If investors had known in advance the size of the Federal Reserve’s latest interest-rate cut, would they have made big money on stocks and bonds trading on this market-moving intel?】

item.description: 首席执行官不再试图面面俱到。【原文：Chief executive officers are no longer trying to be all things to all people.】

item.title: 加纳降息幅度创六年之最，通胀有望缓解
item.description: 加纳下调利率的幅度超过预期，因为这个西非国家的通胀速度放缓，预计还将进一步降温。【原文：Ghana lowered interest rates by more than expected after the pace of inflation slowed in the West African nation and is expected to cool further.】

item.title: 欧洲似乎无法摆脱俄罗斯的能源习惯
item.description: 三年前，俄罗斯是世界上最大的天然气出口国，而欧洲则是其最大的客户。对于欧洲大陆的领导人来说，获得俄罗斯廉价能源的机会超过了与弗拉基米尔-普京总统做生意的疑虑。【原文：Three years ago, Russia was the world’s biggest exporter of natural gas and Europe was its top customer. For the continent’s leaders, access to all that cheap Russian energy outweighed any misgivings over doing business with President Vladimir Putin.】

item.title: 欧盟旨在通过新的拍卖指南阻止中国氢能技术的发展
item.description: 欧盟将采取措施，将中国制造的电解氢器排除在即将举行的拍卖之外，该拍卖旨在促进该集团在绿色转型期间使用氢燃料。【原文：The European Union will take steps to exclude Chinese manufactured hydrogen electrolyzers from an upcoming auction aimed at spurring the use of the fuel during the bloc’s green transition.】

item.title: 亚马逊 40 亿美元的人类学交易获英国监管机构批准
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）与人工智能公司 Anthropic 签订的 40 亿美元投资协议将避免受到深入调查，这是对大型科技公司在人工智能领域大肆挥霍的高度关注。【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s $4 billion investment pact with AI firm Anthropic will avoid an in-depth probe, following heightened scrutiny on big tech’s AI spending spree.】

item.title: LinkedIn 的人工智能默认设置对用户来说并不那么私密
item.description: LinkedIn 的人工智能培训风波提醒我们，告诉用户他们可以 "选择退出 "某些服务是毫无意义的。但首先...【原文：LinkedIn’s AI-training kerfuffle is a stark reminder that telling users they can “opt out” of something is mostly meaningless. But first...】

item.title: 苹果投资者未受人工智能 iPhone 需求不振的影响
item.description: 购物者对 iPhone 16 的反应平平，但这并没有影响投资者对苹果公司股价的热情。【原文：A tepid response from shoppers to the iPhone 16 has not dented investors’ enthusiasm for Apple Inc. shares, which enjoyed a multi-month rally in anticipation of the launch.】

item.title: 汇丰银行在资产负债表清理中偿还 24 年前的遗留资本
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）正在偿还一种早在 2000 年就已发行的资本，因为该公司正在继续清理其账簿上那些在全球金融危机后进行全面改革后已经过时的票据。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is repaying a type of capital issued back in 2000 as it continues to clean up its books of instruments that have been rendered obsolete after the overhaul that followed the global financial crisis.】
